name: Chinbu's Adventure
description: A collectathon action rpg where you play as a young dragon named Chinbu with the unique ability to control all elements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 SP1 or later Processor: Intel i5 2.6Ghz or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1700 MB available space Additional Notes: DX11+ or OpenGL 3.2+
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 SP1 or later Processor: Intel i7 3Ghz or AMD equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1700 MB available space Additional Notes: DX11+ or OpenGL 4+
